reviewText:
Let  me  start  out  by  saying  I  wasn't  thinking  that  this  video  would  "rock  my  world".  It  had  some  of  my favorite  porno  actresses  in  some  "taboo"  scenes.
One  running  theme  that  is  popular  with  porno  viewers  is  the  "mother-gone-wild"  who  seduces  and  screws  the  son's  best  friend  or  even  the  son  himself.  This  video  specializes  in  the  step-mother... step-son  approach,  which,  truthfully,  does  not  break  any  big  taboos.  It's  pretty  safe  to  say  that  a  woman  and  a  younger  man  can  make  love... so  long  as  they  are  not  biologically  connected  to  each  other.
There  are  some  great  scenes... like  the  opening  scene.  where  one  of  my  favorite  older  female  porno stars  works  her  magic.  The  video  is  a  bit  "hit  and  miss"  from  here... some  pairings  jump  starting  your  pulse... others  just  "run  of  the  mill"
Given  the  choice ,  go  for  something  else... perhaps  a  classic  porno  film  with  Johnny  "Wad",  or  Jesse  Jane,  perhaps... it's  entertaining,  but  there  are  better  videos  out  there....
